<!-- generated_at: 2025-12-01T05:24:36Z -->
# Platform: Flutter

## /
- [Readme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/README.md): Developer-facing README providing installation, configuration, and usage guidance for the Clix Flutter SDK, including initialization via `Clix.initialize`, user management APIs, Firebase-based push notification integration, platform setup steps, error handling, and sample app references.
- [Changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/CHANGELOG.md): Documents versioned SDK changes (per Keep a Changelog / SemVer), including core initialization, user management, push notification integration, device/logging features, installation requirements, and updates such as the ClixAPIClient default `User-Agent` header behavior.
- [License](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/LICENSE): Defines the project’s modified MIT-style license, granting standard use/modify/distribute rights while restricting all substantial use to Clix-provided services and disallowing repurposing for unrelated platforms without explicit permission.

## android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/ClixPlugin.kt): Defines the Android entry-point Flutter plugin (`ClixPlugin`) that implements `FlutterPlugin` and `ClixHostApi`, wiring the generated host API via `ClixHostApi.setUp` to the engine’s `binaryMessenger` on attachment and (erroneously) re-setup on detachment.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/Messages.g.kt): Autogenerated Pigeon bridge defining the `ClixHostApi` host interface, its custom `MessagesPigeonCodec`, FlutterError wrapping utilities, and the `setUp` entry point for wiring Android-side message handlers to Flutter via a `BinaryMessenger`.
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/ClixPlugin.kt): Implements the FlutterPlugin entry point for the Clix Flutter SDK, wiring the Android-side `ClixHostApi` over the engine’s `binaryMessenger` during attachment/detachment to expose native host API methods to Dart via platform channels.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/Messages.g.kt): Autogenerated Pigeon bindings defining the `ClixHostApi` Android host interface and its custom `MessagesPigeonCodec`, wiring up Flutter–Android message handling via `BinaryMessenger` with standardized result/error wrapping for platform channel calls.

## ios/Classes
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/Messages.g.swift): Autogenerated Pigeon Swift bindings defining the `ClixHostApi` host protocol, custom `PigeonError` and message codec (`MessagesPigeonCodec`), plus the `ClixHostApiSetup.setUp` entry point for wiring Flutter platform channels on iOS/macOS.
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/ClixPlugin.swift): Defines the iOS entrypoint for the Clix Flutter SDK, registering the `ClixHostApi` over the plugin registrar’s `binaryMessenger` and wiring an `UIApplicationDelegate` to handle (currently no-op) remote notification registration callbacks.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/Messages.g.swift): Autogenerated Pigeon Swift bindings defining the `ClixHostApi` host protocol, custom `PigeonError`, and `MessagesPigeonCodec`, and wiring for platform-channel message handling via `ClixHostApiSetup.setUp(binaryMessenger:api:messageChannelSuffix:)` on iOS/macOS.
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/ClixPlugin.swift): Defines the iOS entrypoint for the Clix Flutter plugin, registering the `ClixHostApi` over the Flutter binary messenger and wiring into `UIApplicationDelegate` push-notification callbacks (currently no-op) for use by the Dart side.

## lib
- [Clix Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/clix_flutter.dart): Primary library entrypoint that re-exports core Clix SDK configuration/runtime (`clix.dart`, `clix_config.
- [Clix Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/clix_flutter.dart): Defines the main `clix_flutter` library entrypoint, re-exporting core configuration (`Clix`, `ClixConfig`), push notification payload and user property models, plus logging level and error utilities for SDK consumers to initialize, configure, and handle Clix Flutter functionality.

## lib/src/core
- [Clix Config.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.g.dart): Generated `json_serializable` helpers for `ClixConfig`, providing `_$ClixConfigFromJson`/`_$ClixConfigToJson` for JSON mapping, default endpoint/log level handling, extraHeaders map conversion, and enum–string mapping via `_$ClixLogLevelEnumMap`.
- [Clix Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_version.dart): Provides a lazily-resolved, cached SDK version string via `ClixVersion.version`, using `package_info_plus`’s `PackageInfo.
- [Clix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix.dart): Central entrypoint singleton that initializes Clix services (storage, API client, device, events, notifications), manages SDK configuration and logging, and exposes public static APIs for user identity/properties, device ID, push token retrieval, and event tracking.
- [Clix Config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.dart): Defines the immutable `ClixConfig` JSON-serializable configuration model (projectId, apiKey, endpoint, logLevel, extraHeaders) used to initialize the SDK, with `toJson`/`fromJson` generated via `json_annotation` and dependent on `ClixLogLevel`.
- [Clix Config.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.g.dart): Generated `json_serializable` helpers for `ClixConfig`, providing `_$ClixConfigFromJson`/`_$ClixConfigToJson` for config hydration/serialization (with defaults for `endpoint` and `logLevel`) and the `ClixLogLevel`↔string mapping used across the core configuration flow.
- [Clix Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_version.dart): Provides a static async `version` getter that retrieves and caches the app’s semantic version via `package_info_plus`’s `PackageInfo.fromPlatform()`, falling back to `"0.
- [Clix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix.dart): Central SDK façade that bootstraps and wires storage, API, device, event, notification, and token services via `initialize(ClixConfig)`, exposes global user/device management (`setUserId`, properties, IDs), push token access, logging control, and event tracking (`trackEvent`).
- [Clix Config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.dart): Defines the `ClixConfig` JSON-serializable configuration model (projectId, apiKey, endpoint, logLevel, extraHeaders) used to initialize the SDK’s core networking/logging behavior, with `toJson`/`fromJson` generated via `json_annotation` and `clix_log_level.dart`.

## lib/src/models
- [Clix Push Notification Payload](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.dart): Defines the `ClixPushNotificationPayload` JSON-serializable model for push message metadata (IDs, URLs, custom properties), providing `fromJson`/`toJson` via `json_serializable` and value semantics where equality and hashing are based solely on `messageId`.
- [Clix Device.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.g.dart): Generated JSON (de)serialization helpers for `ClixDevice`, mapping device/app/sdk metadata fields (e.g.
- [Clix User Property.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.g.dart): Generated JSON serialization helpers for `ClixUserProperty`, providing `_$ClixUserPropertyFromJson`/`_$ClixUserPropertyToJson` and the `PropertyType` ↔ string enum map used by `json_serializable` when encoding/decoding user property payloads.
- [Clix Push Notification Payload.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.g.dart): Generated json_serializable helpers that construct `ClixPushNotificationPayload` from a raw `Map` and serialize it back to JSON, mapping message, campaign, user, device, tracking, landing/image URLs, and arbitrary `custom_properties` for push notification handling.
- [Clix Device](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.dart): Defines the `ClixDevice` JSON-serializable model encapsulating device, OS, locale, app, SDK, and push-notification metadata, with `fromJson`, `toJson`, and `copyWith` helpers, and identity/equality based solely on the `id` field (via json_serializable codegen in `clix_device.g.
- [Clix User Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.dart): Defines the `ClixUserProperty` model and `PropertyType` enum, including a typed factory (`of`) that infers property type from Dart values, JSON serialization via `json_serializable`, and value-based equality/hashCode for user property payloads.
- [Clix Push Notification Payload](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.dart): Defines the `ClixPushNotificationPayload` JSON-serializable model for push notification metadata (IDs, URLs, custom properties), with generated `fromJson/toJson` helpers, identity based on `messageId`, and a concise debug `toString` representation.
- [Clix Device.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.g.dart): Generated `json_serializable` helpers for `ClixDevice`, providing the internal factory `_ClixDeviceFromJson` and serializer `_ClixDeviceToJson` that map device, OS, locale, app, SDK, and push-notification fields to/from the backend JSON schema.
- [Clix User Property.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.g.dart): Generated json_serializable mapper for `ClixUserProperty`, handling JSON deserialization/serialization including `name`, `valueString`, and `PropertyType` enum mapping via `$enumDecode` and the `_PropertyTypeEnumMap` used by the model’s public `fromJson`/`toJson` APIs.
- [Clix Push Notification Payload.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.g.dart): Generated `json_serializable` adapter for `ClixPushNotificationPayload`, implementing the `_$ClixPushNotificationPayloadFromJson` and `_$ClixPushNotificationPayloadToJson` functions to map push notification fields and custom properties between raw JSON maps and the Dart model.
- [Clix Device](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.dart): Defines the `ClixDevice` JSON-serializable model encapsulating device, OS, locale, app, SDK, and push-notification metadata, with `fromJson`, `toJson`, and `copyWith` helpers, and equality/hashCode based solely on `id` (depends on `json_annotation` and generated `clix_device.g.
- [Clix User Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.dart): Defines `ClixUserProperty`, a JSON-serializable user property model with inferred `PropertyType` (string/number/boolean) via `of`, json_serializable codegen (`clix_user_property.g.

## lib/src/platform
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/platform/messages.g.dart): Autogenerated Pigeon message definitions for the Flutter–host bridge, providing a custom `_PigeonCodec` (int handling) and the `ClixHostApi` entry point that configures the `BinaryMessenger` and channel name suffix for platform message channels.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/platform/messages.g.dart): Autogenerated Pigeon platform-messages codec and host API scaffold defining `_PigeonCodec` (custom `StandardMessageCodec` for `int`) and `ClixHostApi` construction/configuration, including binary messenger injection and channel suffixing for Flutter–host platform communication.

## lib/src/services
- [Clix Api Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/clix_api_client.dart): HTTP client wrapper that builds `/api/v1` URIs from `ClixConfig`, injects versioned common headers (project ID, API key, extra headers, User-Agent), logs requests/responses, and exposes `get`, `post`, `put`, `delete`, and `close` methods using `package:http`.
- [Token Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/token_service.dart): Manages push token lifecycle using `StorageService`, providing retrieval (`getCurrentToken`, `getPreviousTokens`), persistence with deduped/limited history (`saveToken`), conversion from byte device tokens (`convertTokenToString`), and full cleanup/reset (`clearTokens`, `reset`) with `ClixLogger` error/debug logging.
- [Event Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_api_service.dart): Provides `EventAPIService.trackEvent`, which logs, constructs the `/events` request payload (device_id, name, custom_properties, optional message_id), posts via `ClixAPIClient`, validates HTTP 2xx responses, and logs or rethrows on failure using `ClixLogger`.
- [Device Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_service.dart): Manages device identity and metadata, mapping local storage, token management, and platform/app info into `ClixDevice` models and delegating to `DeviceAPIService` to register devices, bind/unbind project user IDs, and upsert/remove user properties and push tokens.
- [Notification Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/notification_service.dart): Implements `NotificationService`, a singleton that wires Firebase Cloud Messaging with flutter_local_notifications to manage permission requests, topic subscriptions, FCM token persistence/registration, Clix payload parsing, event tracking, deep-link/URL handling, and foreground/background notification display and callbacks.
- [Event Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_service.dart): Provides `EventService.trackEvent` to send cleaned, device-scoped analytics events via `EventAPIService`, resolving the current device ID from `DeviceService`, logging with `ClixLogger`, and rethrowing failures (typically when `Clix.
- [Storage Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/storage_service.dart): JSON-backed key–value storage abstraction over `SharedPreferences` that lazily initializes preferences, logs lifecycle events via `ClixLogger`, transparently migrates legacy string values, and exposes generic `set<T>`, `get<T>`, and `remove` APIs for SDK data persistence.
- [Device Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_api_service.dart): Defines `DeviceAPIService`, a wrapper around `ClixAPIClient` that logs and performs HTTP POST/DELETE calls to register devices, bind/unbind project user IDs, and upsert/remove `ClixUserProperty` values for a given device, throwing on non-2xx responses.
- [Clix Api Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/clix_api_client.dart): Provides the `ClixAPIClient` HTTP wrapper that builds `/api/v1` URLs from `ClixConfig`, injects versioned auth/user-agent headers, JSON-encodes bodies, logs requests/responses, and exposes `get`, `post`, `put`, `delete`, and `close` methods over `package:http`.
- [Token Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/token_service.dart): Manages push token lifecycle using `StorageService`, providing `getCurrentToken`, `getPreviousTokens`, `saveToken`, `clearTokens`, `reset`, and `convertTokenToString`, with deduplication, max-history enforcement, and error-logged persistence under `_currentTokenKey`/`_previousTokensKey`.
- [Event Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_api_service.dart): Provides `EventAPIService.trackEvent` to POST device-scoped analytics events (with optional `messageId` and custom properties) to `/events` via `ClixAPIClient`, with structured request body construction, HTTP status validation, and logging using `ClixLogger`.
- [Device Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_service.dart): Defines `DeviceService`, which manages persistent device IDs, associates and updates project user IDs and user properties, persists FCM tokens via `TokenService`, builds `ClixDevice` metadata from platform/package/Firebase info, and registers devices through `DeviceAPIService`.
- [Notification Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/notification_service.dart): Handles push notification lifecycle using Firebase Messaging and flutter_local_notifications, including initialization, permission requests, FCM token management/registration, Clix payload parsing, foreground/background display, URL navigation, topic subscription, event tracking, and hooks via onPushReceived/onPushTapped.
- [Event Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_service.dart): Provides `EventService.trackEvent`, which resolves the current device ID via `DeviceService`, cleans null-valued properties, then delegates event tracking to `EventAPIService` with structured logging via `ClixLogger`, rethrowing failures if initialization (Clix.
- [Storage Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/storage_service.dart): Provides a lazy-initialized, JSON-based key–value storage wrapper around `SharedPreferences`, with logging via `ClixLogger`, exposing `set<T>`, `get<T>`, and `remove` methods plus legacy plain-string migration for stored values.
- [Device Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_api_service.dart): Defines `DeviceAPIService`, a thin wrapper over `ClixAPIClient` that logs and performs HTTP calls to upsert devices, bind/unbind project user IDs, and add/remove user properties via `/devices` endpoints using `ClixDevice` and `ClixUserProperty` models.

## lib/src/utils
- [Clix Error](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/clix_error.dart): Defines the `ClixError` exception enum and `ClixErrorWithCause` wrapper used across the SDK for standardized initialization/configuration/network/encoding/decoding error reporting, including helper constructors (`networkError`, `decodingError`, `unknownErrorWithReason`) and value-based equality for cause-aware errors.
- [Clix Error](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/clix_error.dart): Defines the `ClixError` exception enum and `ClixErrorWithCause` helper for standardized SDK error reporting, including static constructors for network/decoding/unknown failures and message-based equality used across initialization, configuration, and HTTP/response handling flows.

## lib/src/utils/logging
- [Clix Logger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_logger.dart): Implements the SDK’s centralized logging utility, mapping `ClixLogLevel`-filtered messages to `dart:developer.log` with timestamps and optional errors, and exposing `setLogLevel`, `log`, and convenience methods (`debug`, `info`, `warn`, `error`) as primary logging entry points.
- [Clix Log Level](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_log_level.dart): Defines the `ClixLogLevel` enum with numeric severity values, comparison operators, and a `shouldLog` helper to determine if messages at a given log level should be emitted based on the current threshold.
- [Clix Logger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_logger.dart): Defines `ClixLogger`, a static logging utility that routes messages to `dart:developer.log` with ISO-8601 timestamps, configurable global `ClixLogLevel` filtering, and convenience entrypoints (`setLogLevel`, `log`, `error`, `warn`, `info`, `debug`) for SDK-wide logging.
- [Clix Log Level](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_log_level.dart): Defines the `ClixLogLevel` enum with ordered severity levels, integer-backed comparison operators, and a `shouldLog` helper used by the logging system to determine whether messages at a given level should be emitted.

## pigeons
- [Messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/pigeons/messages.dart): Pigeon configuration file defining the `ClixHostApi` host-side platform channel interface and generating strongly typed Dart (`messages.g.
- [Messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/pigeons/messages.dart): Configures Pigeon code generation for the Clix Flutter SDK host platform channel, defining the `ClixHostApi` host API and output targets for generated Dart (`messages.g.

## samples/basic_app/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainActivity.kt): Android entrypoint for the basic Flutter sample app, extending `FlutterActivity` as the host activity that boots the Flutter engine and renders the Dart UI with no additional native logic or custom platform integrations.
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainActivity.kt): Android entry-point for the basic Flutter sample app, defining the `MainActivity` that extends `FlutterActivity` to bootstrap the Flutter engine and host the app’s Dart UI on Android.

## samples/basic_app/ios/ClixNotificationExtension
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/ClixNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): iOS Notification Service Extension entry point subclassing `ClixNotificationServiceExtension` to enable Clix Flutter SDK rich push notifications (image downloads, payload processing, analytics) and log lifecycle events in `didReceive` and `serviceExtensionTimeWillExpire`.
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/ClixNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): NotificationService is a sample `ClixNotificationServiceExtension` implementation that initializes Clix’s rich push handling, logs incoming `UNNotificationRequest` payloads, and delegates processing and time-expiry behavior to the Clix Flutter SDK’s notification service extension APIs.

## samples/basic_app/ios/Runner
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): iOS entry-point `AppDelegate` that initializes Firebase (`FirebaseApp.configure()`), registers Flutter plugins via `GeneratedPluginRegistrant.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): iOS app entry point for the Flutter sample that configures Firebase (`FirebaseApp.configure()`), registers generated Flutter plugins (`GeneratedPluginRegistrant.

## samples/basic_app/ios/RunnerTests
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): Defines a placeholder `XCTestCase` (`RunnerTests`) for the iOS host app, intended for adding XCTest-based integration/unit tests around Flutter-Runner interactions without exposing any public APIs yet.
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): Defines the `RunnerTests` XCTestCase scaffold for the iOS Flutter runner target, providing a placeholder `testExample()` entry point where app-specific XCTest-based UI/unit tests can be added.

## samples/basic_app/lib
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/main.dart): Entry point for the basic sample app that initializes Firebase and `Clix` (`Clix.initialize`), then builds a themed UI to display project/device info and demonstrate `Clix.
- [Clix Info](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/clix_info.dart): Defines the `ClixInfo` configuration holder exposing static `projectId` and `apiKey` constants used by the sample app to initialize and authenticate Clix SDK integrations.
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/main.dart): Entry point for the basic sample app that initializes Firebase and the Clix SDK (via `Clix.initialize`), retrieves device/push identifiers, and exposes UI flows to call `Clix.
- [Clix Info](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/clix_info.dart): Defines `ClixInfo`, a simple configuration holder exposing the sample app’s Clix `projectId` and `apiKey` constants used by other components to initialize and authenticate SDK calls.
